sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.city},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.country}{' '} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Your cart is empty. : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${Math.round(100*(item.qty * item.price))/100} ))} ) } } export default PlaceOrderScreen
